chunk:
Honest Beauty Elevated Hydration Mist

Brand: Honest Beauty

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Propanediol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia

Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil , Abies Sibirica Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil,

Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil , Abies Sibirica Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool
Directions: : Close eyes and spray directly into face as needed. Can be used with or without makeup
